data.name: frmMain_About
data.value: Game Backup Monitor[BR]Version: [PARAM] ([PARAM])[BR]Build: [PARAM][BR]Platform: [PARAM][BR]SQLite: [PARAM][BR][BR][PARAM][BR][BR]This program comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY.[BR]This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions.[BR][BR]See gpl-3.0.html in the program folder for details.

data.name: frmMain_ManifestRemovedEntry
data.value: [PARAM] entry was removed from local manfiest.

data.name: frmMain_ManifestTotalRemoved
data.value: [PARAM] entries were removed from the local manifest.

data.name: frmMain_ConfirmRebuild
data.value: This will rebuild all databases and shrink them to an optimal size.[BR]This should only be used if your gbm.s3db files are becoming very large.[BR][BR]Do you wish to continue?

data.name: App_Copyright
data.value: 2014 - [PARAM] Michael J. Seiferling and Game Backup Monitor contributors

data.name: frmMain_Exit
data.value: Are you sure you want to exit? Your games will no longer be monitored.

data.name: frmMain_ConfirmBackup
data.value: Do you wish to backup data from [PARAM]?

data.name: frmMain_ConfirmMonitorCancel
data.value: Do you wish to cancel the monitoring of [PARAM]?[BR][BR]Warning: When monitoring is cancelled, session time is NOT saved.

data.name: frmMain_ConfirmRunAsAdmin
data.value: Do you want to restart Game Backup Monitor as Administrator?

data.name: frmMain_Error64Backup
data.value: [PARAM] is a 64-bit game and GBM is 32-bit. GBM cannot detect the required information to save your backup.

data.name: frmMain_Error7zip
data.value: 7-Zip was not found. The application cannot continue.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorAdminBackup
data.value: [PARAM] was running as Administrator and GBM is not, GBM cannot detect the required information to save your backup.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorAdminDetect
data.value: [PARAM] is running as Administrator and GBM is not.[BR]You cannot cancel monitoring at this time.[BR][BR]Run GBM as Administrator to prevent this issue.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorAlreadyAdmin
data.value: Game Backup Monitor is already running as Administrator.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorAppLocationChanged
data.value: GBM is running from a new location, the Windows startup entry has been updated.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorBackupSessionLength
data.value: [PARAM] backup was cancelled due to session length.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorBackupUnknownPath
data.value: [PARAM] backup was cancelled due to unknown path.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorCustomVariable
data.value: The following monitored game(s) are using a custom path variable that is not set.[BR][PARAM][BR][BR]You will encounter backup/restore errors or detection issues with these games until the variables are set.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorDBVerLocal
data.value: Your local GBM data (Version [PARAM]) is too new for your version of GBM (Version [PARAM]).[BR][BR]Please upgrade GBM or restore the database file appropriate for your version. The application cannot proceed.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorDBVerRemote
data.value: The GBM data (Version [PARAM]) in your backup folder is too new for your version of GBM (Version [PARAM])[BR][BR]All computers sharing a backup folder must use the same version of GBM. The application cannot proceed.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorMulti64
data.value: Install the 64-bit version of GBM to detect the last running game.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorMultiAdmin
data.value: Restart GBM as Administrator to detect the last running game.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorRelativePath
data.value: [PARAM] uses a relative path and has never been detected on this computer.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorRestorePath
data.value: [PARAM] restore was cancelled due to a restore path issue.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorSettingsFolder
data.value: An error occurred creating application settings folder. The application cannot proceed.[BR][BR][PARAM]

data.name: frmMain_MasterListChanged
data.value: The master game list has been changed by a program other than GBM.

data.name: frmMain_RunningAsAdmin
data.value: GBM is running with Administrator privileges.

data.name: frmMain_RunningAsNormal
data.value: GBM is running with normal privileges. Click to restart as Administrator.

data.value: Click to toggle monitoring on or off.

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep1Instructions
data.value: You may drag and drop a shortcut here to complete this step, only Windows shortcuts are currently supported.

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep1Intro
data.value: Enter the name of the game to monitor:

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep2Instructions
data.value: Some games use launchers. Do not monitor launchers, be sure to choose the game's actual executable file. You may drag and drop a shortcut here to complete this step, only Windows shortcuts are currently supported.

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep2Intro
data.value: Choose the game's executable file or shortcut:

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep3aInstructions
data.value: Choose any file types, specific files or folders you wish to include in the backup. If you're unsure, go back a step and choose to save the entire folder.

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep3Instructions
data.value: If you're unsure of exactly which files to backup, make sure Save entire folder is checked. You can also choose to save multiple backups and set a limit on how many to keep.

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep3Intro
data.value: Choose the location of your game's save files:

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep4Instructions
data.value: Choose any file types, specific files or folders you wish to exclude from the backup. You may choose multiple items to exclude. This step can be skipped.

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep5Intro
data.value: Verify your settings below and click Finish to save.

data.value: Please choose the game you were playing:

data.value: The selected path must be a full path.

data.value: You must select a backup path to continue.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_ErrorNoFolderExists

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_ExistingData
data.value: Existing GBM data was detected in the backup folder and has been imported.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep1Instructions
data.value: This guide will help you through some quick and easy steps to get started.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep1Instructions2
data.value: If you'd like to learn about advanced features or have any other questions before you get started, there is a detailed online manual available.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep2Instructions
data.value: All your backup files along with a manifest database (gbm.s3db) will be stored in this location. Any existing GBM data in this folder will be automatically imported.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep2Intro
data.value: Choose where backup files will be saved:

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep3Intro
data.value: Before you can start monitoring for games, they need to be configured so GBM knows what to look for and how to handle them. You can download pre-made configurations from the official list or add them all yourself using the tools below. You can also skip this step for now!

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep4Instructions
data.value: Game Backup Monitor will automatically monitor and backup your games each time they are closed.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep4Instructions2
data.value: Remember that GBM can only currently monitor one game at a time.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep4Instructions3
data.value: You can change anything you've setup in this wizard and find more settings and features by exploring the menus.

data.name: mgrBackup_ErrorImportBackupCopy
data.value: Failed to import [PARAM], the file could not be copied.

data.name: frmVariableManager_ErrorVariableReserved
data.value: [PARAM] is a reserved variable, you must enter a different name.

data.name: frmGameManager_WarningImportBackupSaveMulti
data.value: The "Save multiple backups" option must be enabled on this configuration to import multiple backup files.

data.name: mgrMonitorList_WarningWinConfigsInLinux
data.value: Official Windows configurations can be used in Linux for games running in Wine or Proton.[BR][BR]You do not need to modify these configurations, GBM will automatically do any required path conversions when the game is detected.[BR][BR]This message will only be shown once.

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmBackupImportOverwriteSingle
data.value: Importing this backup file will overwrite the current backup file for [PARAM].[BR][BR]Do you want to continue? This will close the form.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorNoWineSavePath
data.value: [PARAM] uses a Windows configuration and requires a Wine save path to perform this operation.

data.name: frmWineConfiguration_ErrorValidationBinaryPath
data.value: The Wine binary path is required.[BR][BR]Clear all fields and save to remove all Wine data for this game.

data.name: frmWineConfiguration_ErrorValidationPrefix
data.value: The Wine Prefix is required.[BR][BR]Clear all fields and save to remove all Wine data for this game.

data.name: frmWineConfiguration_WarningSingle
data.value: Game Backup Monitor automatically updates the Wine configuration for a game each time it is detected. Modifying any of these fields manually is not recommended in most cases.[BR][BR]This warning will only be displayed once.

data.name: App_ErrorLaunchExternal
data.value: An error occurred attempting to launch the application:[BR][BR][PARAM]

data.name: mgrBackup_ErrorPathIsUNC
data.value: The temporary or backup folder is a UNC path. The disk space check has been skipped.

data.name: frmSettings_chkDisableDiskSpaceCheck
data.value: Disable disk space check prior to backup

data.name: frmMain_ErrorLinuxAutoStartMissing
data.value: GBM is set to start automatically, but the autostart link is missing. The autostart link has been re-created.

data.name: frmSettings_ErrorLinuxAutoStart
data.value: An error occurred while configuring autostart:[BR][BR][PARAM]

data.name: mgrBackup_ErrorRegNotFound
data.value: The utility reg.exe could not be located at [PARAM]. The backup cannot continue.

data.name: mgrBackup_ErrorWineNotFound
data.value: The wine binary could not be located at [PARAM]. The backup cannot continue.

data.name: mgrRestore_ErrorRegNotFound
data.value: The utility reg.exe could not be located at [PARAM]. The restore cannot continue.

data.name: mgrRestore_ErrorWineNotFound
data.value: The wine binary could not be located at [PARAM]. The restore cannot continue.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorLinuxAutoStartLinkMissing
data.value: GBM is set to start automatically, but the desktop link is missing. Automatic start has been disabled, please re-install GBM using a package manager or the makefile.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep2Warning
data.value: You cannot return to this step after clicking Next. The Backup Location can be changed any time once Setup is complete.

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmMultiSave
data.value: Are you sure you want to save the following changes to [PARAM] selected games?[BR][BR]Allow monitoring: [PARAM][BR]No backup when game ends: [PARAM]

data.name: frmGameManager_WarningEmptyProcess
data.value: A valid process name or regular expression is required to monitor and backup your saved games automatically.[BR][BR]You may leave the Process field blank to a create manual backup configuration for this game, these configurations will be automatically excluded from monitoring.[BR][BR]This warning will only be displayed once.

data.name: mgrBackup_ErrorMetadataFailure
data.value: Backup Aborted. An error occurred while creating backup metadata for [PARAM].

data.name: App_Operation_FileNotFound
data.value: [PARAM] operation failed because a required file was not found.

data.name: mgrBackup_WarningMetadataMismatch
data.value: The configuration metadata in the backup file ([PARAM]) does not match the game you selected.[BR][BR]Do you want to continue importing this file anyway? (Not Recommended)

data.name: mgrBackup_WarningNoMetadata
data.value: The backup file ([PARAM]) contains no metadata or is an invalid archive.[BR][BR]Do you want to continue importing this file? (Not Recommended)

data.name: mgrBackup_ErrorNoMetadata
data.value: The file [PARAM] contains no metadata or is an invalid archive.

data.name: mgrBackup_ErrorReadingMetadata
data.value: An error occuring reading the metadata in the file [PARAM].

data.name: mgrBackup_GamesAddedDuringImport
data.value: [PARAM] game configuration(s) added or updated during the import process.

data.name: frmConfigLinks_FormNameMulti
data.value: Edit Configuration Links for Multiple Games

data.name: frmGameManager_RestoreLinkWarning
data.value: [PARAM] is linked to another game configuration. A linked restore cannot be done when selecting an older backup file.[BR][BR]Do you want to continue without restoring any linked configuration(s)?

data.name: frmGameManager_TipLinkConfiguration
data.value: The following screen allows you to link other game configuations to this one. Each time this configuration triggers a backup or restore, the linked configurations will run as well. Please see the Online Manual for more details.[BR][BR]This message will only be displayed once.

data.name: frmGameManager_TipLinkProcess
data.value: The following screen allows you to link other software to run each time this game configuration is detected. Use the Process Manager to setup software to link.[BR][BR]This message will only be displayed once.

data.name: mgrBackup_ErrorImportOSMismatch
data.value: [PARAM] was created on [PARAM] and you're currently running [PARAM]. This backup file cannot be imported using this method.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_ExistingFilesDetected
data.value: [PARAM] possible backup files have been detected in the backup folder. Do you want to scan and import any valid files?

data.name: frmMain_WarningFullBackup
data.value: Are you sure you want to run a backup for every game?[BR][BR]GBM automatically determines which backups can be performed and handles any confirmations that normally require user input. See the Online Manual for more details.

data.name: frmMain_WarningFullRestore
data.value: Are you sure you want to restore the latest backup for every game?[BR][BR]GBM automatically determines which backups can be restored and handles any confirmations that normally require user input. See the Online Manual for more details.

data.name: mgrBackup_FullAbort
data.value: Any remaining backup operations have been aborted.

data.name: mgrRestore_FullAbort
data.value: Any remaining restore operations have been aborted.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_ExistingDataAndFilesDetected
data.value: [PARAM] backup files have been detected in the backup folder. Do you want to scan and verify all backup files?[BR][BR]This is likely unnecessary since the backup folder already contains a GBM database.

data.name: frmSettings_ErrorTempFolder
data.value: The temporary folder does not exist. Please choose a valid temporary folder.

data.name: mgrBackup_ErrorMovingBackupFile
data.value: An error occurred while moving the [PARAM] backup file from the temporary folder to the backup folder.

data.name: frmLauncherManager_ConfirmDelete
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete [PARAM]? This cannot be undone.

data.name: frmLauncherManager_ErrorDupe
data.value: A launcher with this name already exists.

data.name: frmLauncherManager_ErrorValidCommand
data.value: A valid launch command is required.

data.name: frmLauncherManager_ErrorValidName
data.value: You must enter a valid name for this launcher.

data.name: frmLaunchConfiguration_ErrorNoGameID
data.value: A valid Game ID is required to use [PARAM].

data.name: mgrLaunchGame_ErrorException
data.value: An error occurred while attempting to launch a game.[BR][BR][PARAM]

data.name: mgrLaunchGame_ErrorNoProcess
data.value: [PARAM] cannot be launched, it's configuration has no process.

data.name: mgrCommon_ErrorRestartAsAdmin
data.value: An error occurred starting GBM as Administrator.[BR][BR][PARAM]

data.name: frmMain_Warning64NoPath
data.value: [PARAM] is a 64-bit game and GBM is 32-bit. The process path can not be determined, but is not required for this backup configuration.

data.name: frmMain_WarningAdminNoPath
data.value: [PARAM] is running as Administrator and GBM is not. The process path can not be determined, but is not required for this backup configuration.

data.name: mgrLaunchGame_ErrorIsBlacklisted
data.value: [PARAM] cannot be launched, it's using a recognized emulator or interpreter without a parameter.[BR][BR]Set the parameter field, or use an alternate executable and argument in the Launch Settings for this game.

data.name: mgrLaunchGame_ErrorIsRegex
data.value: [PARAM] cannot be launched, it's configuration is using a regular expression.[BR][BR]Set a specific executable to use in the Launch Settings for this game.

data.name: mgrLaunchGame_ErrorNoProcessPath
data.value: [PARAM] cannot be launched, it's configuration has no process path.

data.name: mgrLaunchGame_ErrorNoExe
data.value: The game executable could not be found at:[BR][BR][PARAM]

data.name: frmLauncherManager_ConfirmAddDefaults
data.value: Do you want to re-add the default launchers?[BR][BR]This will not overwrite any existing launchers of the same name.

data.name: mgrLaunchGame_WarningLaunchElevation
data.value: GBM is running as Administrator.[BR][BR]Are you sure you want to launch [PARAM] as Administrator?

data.name: frmLauncherManager_ErrorInvalidURI
data.value: The launch command must be a valid URI.

data.name: mgrLaunchGame_ErrorNoAutoWineSupport
data.value: Launching Windows games in Linux with an automatically built command is not currently supported.[BR][BR]You can manually configure this game to use an external launcher or script instead.

data.name: frmSettings_ConfirmEnableLauncherSessions
data.value: The Session Tracking feature can be used to show you recently played games to launch from the system tray menu.[BR][BR]Do you want to enable Session Tracking?

data.name: frmMain_gMonStripCollapseShowToolTip

data.name: mgrLaunchGame_ErrorUseWindowTitle
data.value: [PARAM] cannot be launched using a window title.

data.name: frmSettings_chkBackupNotification
data.value: Show notification when a backup is completed

data.value: Are you sure you want to restore the selected backup for [PARAM]? This will close the form.[BR][BR][PARAM] ([PARAM])

data.value: Incomplete backup operations ([PARAM]) are being automatically resumed.

data.name: frmLauncherManager_ChooseLauncherExe
data.value: Choose the executable of the launcher

data.value: Launch parameters are required when the launcher is an Executable type.

data.name: mgrBackup_ErrorRegBackupFailed
data.value: The backup has failed, please ensure the registry path is correct.

data.name: mgrBackup_ErrorDiffParentNotFound
data.value: A current full backup for [PARAM] could not be found or the interval has been reached. A new full backup will be created.

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmBackupDeleteDiffParent
data.value: This is the full backup file for a set of differential backups, all the differential backup files that rely on this file will also be deleted. This cannot be undone.[BR][BR]Are you sure you want to delete [PARAM]?

data.name: frmMain_ErrorDifferentialParentNotFound
data.value: The restore for [PARAM] cannot continue. The backup being restored is a differential backup, but the required full backup cannot be found.

data.name: mgrBackup_ErrorImportNoDifferentialParent
data.value: [PARAM] cannot be imported. It is a differential backup and it's associated full backup could not be found.

data.name: frmMain_RestoreQueueDiffParent
data.value: The required full backup [PARAM] ([PARAM]) was added to restore queue.

data.name: mgrBackup_WarningOldMetadata
data.value: The metadata is no longer fully compatible with this version, some information may not be imported.

data.name: mgrBackup_ErrorImportDifferentialWithNoMetadata
data.value: [PARAM] is configured to use differential backups, but [PARAM] contains no metadata to properly identify the type of backup file. This file cannot be imported.

data.name: mgrBackup_WarningImportNoDifferentialParent
data.value: [PARAM] is a differential backup, but it's associated full backup could not be found. It has been pushed to the bottom of the import queue.

data.name: frmMain_BackupPathNotAvailable
data.value: Backup path not available. Timeout: [PARAM] seconds
